name: 3D Stock Cars II
overview: 3D Stock Cars II is a game based on the arcade game Super Sprint where you must race other drivers around various tracks to become champion. You can select to race against up to three other drivers (a championship with just you driving is possible) who can be either human or computer controlled. The computer drivers can also have their skill level adjusted from 1 to 15. The Championship is raced over 18 tracks but you can also select how many tracks and which tracks to compete on.
